## StabilityPoolGainsWithdrawalDetails interface

Details of a [withdrawGainsFromStabilityPool()](./arth-base.transactableliquity.withdrawgainsfromstabilitypool.md) transaction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface StabilityPoolGainsWithdrawalDetails 
```

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [arthLoss](./arth-base.stabilitypoolgainswithdrawaldetails.arthloss.md) | [Decimal](./arth-base.decimal.md) | Amount of ARTH burned from the deposit by liquidations since the last modification. |
|  [collateralGain](./arth-base.stabilitypoolgainswithdrawaldetails.collateralgain.md) | [Decimal](./arth-base.decimal.md) | Amount of native currency (e.g. Ether) paid out to the depositor in this transaction. |
